inspectId = #{inspectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update doc_pat_inspect_record set inspectId = #{inspectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dep = #{dep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, samp = #{samp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instruction = #{instruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reportDate = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reqDoctorId = #{reqDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from doc_pat_inspect_record where 1=1
AND date >= to_date(#{filter.value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')
AND date <= to_date(#{filter.value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')
AND ${filter.field} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{filter.value}),'%')
